result.name: VINOD KR GUPTA
skills: Contract Management (Review, Negotiation, Claims, Disputes, EOT)
Quality Standards (IS Codes, IRC Standards, MoRTH Specifications)
Project Management Software (MS Project, Primavera, SAP)

responsibilities: Pan India In-Charge for preparation and submission of COS (Change-of-Scope)/ Variables and EOT (Extension-of-Time) requests for Highway/ Expressway Projects.
Assigned to 4 projects (3 under HAM Mode, and 1 under EPC Mode) for the preparation and quantification of contractual claims.
Actively involved in strategizing for Provisional Certificate of Completion, Completion Certificate and Fore Closure processes.
Recognized for exceptional performance and relocated from Site Office to Head Office.
